title: Magnetic field - field lines around bar magnet

content.prompt: Which figure shows a correct representation for the magnetic field, and why?

choices.label: Figure 1, because magnetic field lines form closed loops that point away from the north pole and towards the south pole outside the magnet
Figure 1, because magnetic field lines originate on the north pole of the magnet and terminate on the south pole of the magnet
Figure 2, because the magnetic field lines from a bar magnet are straight lines
Figure 2, because the magnetic field lines at the ends of the magnets are parallel to each other
